page.title: ServerlessDays ANZ - Somy Ayazi
page.description: Somy is an Engineering Manager at Atlassian. She has a technical background and many years of experience delivering modern business technology solutions across different organisations and industries. /n/n/n She is Microsoft AI MVP and provides support to the IT community by co-organising Global AI Podcast and AI APAC Meetups. She is passionate about AI and keen to utilise AI-powered technology to supercharge product capabilities.
